# Zoho Projects Manager Widget

Secure Zoho SalesIQ widget for managing Zoho Projects tasks and bugs with serverless proxy authentication.

## Features

- Task & Bug Management
- Project Search
- Secure API Key Authentication
- Serverless Vercel Deployment

## Quick Deploy

[![Deploy with Vercel](https://vercel.com/button)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/katsu18072025/zohoprojectsproxy)

See [README.md](README.md) for full documentation.
